text:
From time to time, we may also use your information to contact you for market research purposes.
The information we collect as a result of voluntary submission may include, but not limited to; Name, Company Name, Email Address, Demographic information such as postcode, preferences, and interests among other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers.
We may use the information to customize the website according to your interests
We may use the information to improve our products and services.
We only use this information for statistical analysis purposes and then the data is removed from the system.

This helps us analyze data about webpage traffic and improve our website in order to tailor it to customer needs.
We only use this information for statistical analysis purposes and then the data is removed from the system.
A cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any information about you, other than the data you choose to share with us.
Novelvox is committed to ensuring that no information provided by EHR will be shared, sold, or rented to a third party.

Neither we share nor we sell such information without your consent (if submitted voluntarily).
NovelVox never collects personally identifiable information (PII) that you do not volunteer.

We may ask you to provide your personal information when you visit our website to avail services that require personal data recording.
We may use your personal information to send you promotional information about third parties which we think you may find interesting; only if you agree to it.
You will also require to provide us with personal data when you subscribe to our marketing services including promotional newsletters, emails, etc.
